allow: Bash(cmd /c "if not exist D:\\Projects mkdir D:\\Projects && cd /d D:\\Projects && npx create-next-app@latest anime-site --typescript --tailwind --eslint --app --src-dir --use-npm --yes")
Bash(cmd /c "D: && cd D:\\ && mkdir Projects 2>nul && cd Projects && npx create-next-app@latest anime-site --typescript --tailwind --eslint --app --src-dir --use-npm")

Bash(powershell -Command "Set-Location D:\\; if \(!\(Test-Path ''Projects''\)\) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Name ''Projects'' }; Set-Location Projects; npx create-next-app@latest anime-site --typescript --tailwind --eslint --app --src-dir --use-npm --yes")
